issue.title: [C++][Java] Dataset: Support reading from fixed offset of a file for Parquet format
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17161](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17161). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This adds property **start_offset_** and **length_** to FileSource and should be functional for Parquet dataset format. Supporting Java and C++ dataset API at this time.
